mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deposit_product ( deposit_product_code, bank_id, deposit_product_name, deposit_product_term, deposit_product_rate, deposit_product_max_rate ) VALUES ( #{depositProductCode}, #{depositProductBankId}, #{depositProductName}, #{depositProductTerm}, #{depositProductRate}, #{depositProductMaxRate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM deposit_product WHERE bank_id = #{bankId} ORDER BY deposit_product_max_rate DESC, CASE WHEN #{finTypeCode} = 1 OR #{finTypeCode} = 3 THEN deposit_product_term ELSE 9999 END ASC, CASE WHEN #{finTypeCode} = 2 OR #{finTypeCode} = 4 THEN deposit_product_term ELSE 0 END DESC LIMIT 2
